class.name: SGCollisionPolygon2D
class.brief_description: Defines a convex 2D collision polygon for SG Physics 2D.
class.description: Provides a convex 2D collision polygon to an [SGCollisionObject2D] parent. Non-convex polygons won't work, and will show a warning in the editor.
